column4: Rogers CFO Michael Ludwig to retire this year
column5: Feb 18 (Reuters) - Circuit material maker Rogers Corp said on Thursday Chief Financial Officer Michael Ludwig will retire later this year.
column6: He intends to continue in his role until a successor is named, the company said.

column4: BRIEF-Rogers Corp Says On May 17, Mark Weaver Was Appointed As Interim Principal Financial Officer
column6: * ROGERS CORP SAYS ON MAY 17, MARK WEAVER WAS APPOINTED AS INTERIM PRINCIPAL FINANCIAL OFFICER, EFFECTIVE MAY 17, 2018 - SEC FILING
column7: * ROGERS CORP - WEAVER IS EXPECTED TO SERVE AS INTERIM PRINCIPAL FINANCIAL OFFICER UNTIL CO HIRES A NEW CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER Source bit.ly/2IsUZzg Further company coverage:
